extendedInfo.description: The Florida House mobile app for Android puts you at the center of all of the legislative action in the Florida House of Representatives. With a variety of features optimized for your smartphone and tablet, the Florida House mobile app allows users to read about House members and Committees, view the House calendar, look up bills, watch live streaming video of committee meetings from the current session and access all of the Houseâs public guides. The Florida House mobile app empowers users and puts the daily business of the Florida House in your hands with the following tools:â¢ CONTACT your member of the Florida House of Representative by accessing his or her email address, phone number and office location under the Members tab;â¢ BROWSE House committees to find out which bills are under consideration by which committee;â¢ VIEW House calendars, including the Chamber Calendar, Committee Calendar and Events Calendar and plan to attend House of Representative public events when visiting the Florida Capitol,â¢ WATCH the Florida House live by accessing streaming live video (only available during interim committee weeks and the regular legislative session);â¢ VIEW member picture galleries, which are updated throughout the regular legislative session;â¢ LOOKUP bills and track them by subscribing to push notifications on all bill actions;â¢ ACCESS House publications including the House telephone directory, Clerkâs manual, leadership directory, administrative directory and committee directory;â¢ READ the House rules;â¢ ACCESS Florida lobbyist registration;â¢ READ the Florida House Guide to Government; and â¢ SHARE Link to Bill information via Facebook, Twitter and Email.The Florida House mobile app provides you with current information involving real time/near-real time updates. The user experience and response times are best when used with a wireless network connection. Additionally, real time /near-real time data transfer, including live video streams from this or any similar App, can result in high data plan usage on a 3G/4G network. So go âWirelessâ when available.Android is a diverse market place with a multitude of devices, OS versions, and carriers. The Florida House mobile app is best experienced on Android devices running âIce Cream Sandwichâ 4.0+ and greater. Hardware with 1GB of RAM or greater is alsorecommended.

reviews.title: Keeps restarting
reviews.comment: This app keeps restarting even after going into settings to force close it. Also keeps sending connection error notifications...session is over there should be no notifications. And there doesnt seem to be setting in app to turn off notifications. ANNOYING. I guess uninstalling is only remedy.
reviews.author: Joe Marino

reviews.title: Nice
reviews.comment: Easy to use and easy to find information
reviews.author: Joshua Linker

reviews.title: AWESOME APP
reviews.comment: Amazingly designed and smooth operation. Great work here with lots of useful information on current goings ons
reviews.author: Paul Venturini

reviews.title: Permission Concerns
reviews.comment: Not sure why they need precise GPS location permissions
reviews.author: Lanier Clyatt

reviews.title: Very cool
reviews.comment: All the information from the main website in a simple and easy to use navigation to keep track of bills and keeping the public informed.
reviews.author: Michael Perez
